shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the CDN streaming state changes.

p.codeblock: void onDirectCdnStreamingStateChanged( DirectCdnStreamingState state, DirectCdnStreamingReason reason, String message);
DECLARE_DYNAMIC_MULTICAST_DELEGATE_ThreeParams(FOnDirectCdnStreamingStateChanged, EDIRECT_CDN_STREAMING_STATE, state, EDIRECT_CDN_STREAMING_REASON, error, FString, message);
public virtual void OnDirectCdnStreamingStateChanged(DIRECT_CDN_STREAMING_STATE state, DIRECT_CDN_STREAMING_REASON reason, string message)
final void Function( DirectCdnStreamingState state, DirectCdnStreamingReason reason, String message)? onDirectCdnStreamingStateChanged;

section.p: When the host directly pushes streams to the CDN, if the streaming state changes, the SDK triggers this callback to report the changed streaming state, error codes, and other information. You can troubleshoot issues by referring to this callback.

plentry.pd: The current CDN streaming state. See .
Reasons for changes in the status of CDN streaming. See .
The information about the changed streaming state.
